description:
Kamitsuki, Todoroki, Shinooka and Yeti are driving  to Myogi Shrine in Todoroki`s senpai`s car. Mt. Myogi is one of three wonders of Japan, and Shinooka is excited to visit the shrine. Kamitsuki grins about Shinooka`s regular clothes until a truck appears from behind a curve...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nous ne connaissions pas encore Gunma
Wareware wa Mada Gunma o Shiranakatta
我々はまだグンマを知らなかった
